IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MISSION OF WESTOVER SCHOOL IS TO PROVIDE AN ENVIRONMENT THAT INSPIRES THE INTELLECTUAL, ARTIST, ATHLETE, AND PHILOSOPHER IN EACH STUDENT. WESTOVER CHALLENGES YOUNG WOMEN TO THINK INDEPENDENTLY, TO EMBRACE DIVERSITY, AND TO GROW INTELLECTUALLY AND SPIRITUALLY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF WESTOVER SCHOOL IS TO PROVIDE AN ENVIRONMENT THAT INSPIRES THE INTELLECTUAL, ARTIST, ATHLETE, AND PHILOSOPHER IN EACH STUDENT. WESTOVER CHALLENGES YOUNG WOMEN TO THINK INDEPENDENTLY, TO EMBRACE DIVERSITY, AND TO GROW INTELLECTUALLY AND SPIRITUALLY.
IRS990.Desc: THE PROGRAM SERVICES RENDERED ARE THOSE ASSOCIATED WITH COLLEGE PREP INSTITUTIONS. THESE INCLUDE, PROVIDING AN ENVIRONMENT SUITABLE FOR THE EDUCATION, DORMITORY SERVICE, TEXTBOOKS AND SUPPLIES AND ATHLETIC FACILITIES INCLUDING USE OF THE FACILITIES BY OTHER ORGANIZATIONS FOR THE SAME PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL PROVIDES HOUSING FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, ASSISTANT HEAD OF SCHOOL, AND THE DIRECTOR OF DEVELOPMENT, SO THAT THEY MAY PERFORM THEIR DUTIES AND BE AVAILABLE FOR FUNDRAISING AND OTHER SOCIAL ACTIVITIES ASSOCIATED WITH A PRIVATE SECONDARY SCHOOL. PERSONAL SERVICES ARE PROVIDED FOR THE UPKEEP AND MAINTENANCE OF THE RESIDENCE AND ITS GROUNDS.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: REFUNDING OF WESTOVER SCHOOL ISSUE SERIES A DATED NOVEMBER 1, 2000.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SCH L, PART IV, BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS INVOLVING INTERESTED PERSONS: (A) NAME OF PERSON: KIM LADD (B) RELATIONSHIP: BUSINESS MANAGER'S WIFE (D) DESCRIPTION OF TRANSACTION: EMPLOYEE OF THE SCHOOL, WAGES

THE MISSION OF WESTOVER SCHOOL IS TO PROVIDE AN ENVIRONMENT THAT INSPIRES THE INTELLECTUAL, ARTIST, ATHLETE, AND PHILOSOPHER IN EACH STUDENT. WESTOVER CHALLENGES YOUNG WOMEN TO THINK INDEPENDENTLY, TO EMBRACE DIVERSITY, AND TO GROW INTELLECTUALLY AND SPIRITUALLY.
FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BUSINESS MANAGER AND IS MADE AVAILABLE TO THE GOVERNING BOARD UPON REQUEST.
ANNUALLY THE TRUSTEES AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. FOLLOWUP TO INSURE COMPLIANCE IS DONE BY THE SCHOOL.

THE SCHOOL HAS A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE THAT IS CHAIRED BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. THE COMMITTEE REVIEWS STATISTICAL DATA FROM THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FROM INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS AND SURVEYS OF CT INDEPEDENT SCHOOLS TO PROVIDE COMPARATIVE DATA. IN DETERMINING COMPENSATION, A PERFORMANCE REVIEW IS ALSO COMPLETED. THE RESULTS OF THE COMMITTEE ARE FORWARDED IN WRITING TO THE BUSINESS MANAGER AND A COPY IS MAINTAINED IN THE PERSONNEL FILE.

THE SCHOOL HAS A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE THAT IS CHAIRED BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. THE COMMITTEE REVIEWS STATISTICAL DATA FROM THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FROM INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS AND SURVEYS OF CT INDEPEDENT SCHOOLS TO PROVIDE COMPARATIVE DATA. IN DETERMINING COMPENSATION, A PERFORMANCE REVIEW IS ALSO COMPLETED. THE RESULTS OF THE COMMITTEE ARE FORWARDED IN WRITING TO THE BUSINESS MANAGER AND A COPY IS MAINTAINED IN THE PERSONNEL FILE.
UPON WRITTEN REQUEST THE SCHOOL WILL MAKE AVAILABLE DOCUMENTS THAT THE SCHOOL HAS.
